title: RADSssssssSSSZZZZZzzzzZZZZ
body: Still getting rads error since about 6pm gg QQ I just want to LEAGURE!!!!! Rito please don't waste all your money on RP skins and pay your server bill :)

replies.body: It's an your ISP's DNS problem, not Riot's servers. Change your DNS (temporarily) to the Google public ones (8.8.8.8 and 8.8.8.4), flush your DNS, and try again.

> [{quoted}](name=Strat,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJdmNPlY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T10:07:18.880+0000)
>
> It's an your ISP's DNS problem, not Riot's servers. Change your DNS (temporarily) to the Google public ones (8.8.8.8 and 8.8.8.4), flush your DNS, and try again.

There is a lot of people experiencing this Rads problem and what you're saying to do doesn't work. It's not our side its Riot's side.
Actually I've tried that and it hasn't worked. Almost everyone on every server's having the same problem. Just gonna wait this one out XD
